function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Globalization and environmental change contribute to the spread of vector-borne diseases (VBD)","Impact":"Increased risk of VBD outbreaks and transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict surveillance and monitoring of international travel and trade, as well as measures to control the movement of invasive pathogens","Technologies":"GIS mapping for disease tracking, international health regulations compliance monitoring systems","People":"General public, travelers, international trade workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Approximately 60% of human pathogens are estimated to be of zoonotic origin","Impact":"Higher probability of zoonotic disease transmission from animals to humans","Mitigation":"Implement strict animal disease surveillance and control measures, promote responsible animal husbandry practices","Technologies":"Animal disease surveillance systems, rapid diagnostic tests for zoonotic pathogens","People":"Farmers, livestock handlers, agricultural workers","Owner":"Agricultural and veterinary authorities"},{"Description":"Land-use can indirectly determine the spread of zoonotic diseases through exposure pathways in different urban, sub-urban, and rural settings","Impact":"Increased risk of zoonotic disease transmission in diverse environmental landscapes","Mitigation":"Implement urban planning measures to minimize human-animal interface, promote green spaces in urban areas, control animal habitats in rural settings","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis for urban planning, ecological impact assessment tools","People":"Urban planners, environmental regulators, rural communities","Owner":"Local government, environmental agencies"}]}
